Name: sna-abdullahjmadini
Author: Abdullah J. M. Adini And Students

Translations.Text: Hapana achaupinda kunze kweavo vachange vasina mufaro
Avo vanoramba vofuratira
Uye Al-Muttaqoon (vatsvene, vanhu vanotya Allah) vachaiswa kure nawo (moto weGehena)
Uye anopa hupfumi hwake kuti azvichenese
Uye uyo asiri kuripa chakanaka chaakaitirwa naani zvake
Kunze kwekuti achitsvaga chiso (kufadza) chaTenzi vake vepamusoro-soro
Uye zvirokwazvo mushure maizvozvo, achava anofara (paachapinda Paradhiso)
(Ndinopika) nenguva yemangwanani (zuva richangobuda)
(Ndinopika) nenguva yemanheru apo painoita rima
Tenzi vako (Iwe Muhammad (SAW)) havana kukurasirira kana kukuvenga
Uye zvirokwazvo hupenyu hwemangwana hwakanaka kwauri kukunda hupenyu hwenyika ino
Uye zvirokwazvo, Tenzi vako vachakupa (zvakanaka) naizvozvo ugofara
Havana here kukuwana (Muhammad (SAW)) uri nherera ndokubva vakuchengetedza
Uye vakakuwana wakarasika ndokubva vakutungamirira
Uye vakakuwana uri murombo ndokubva vakuita mupfumi (mugutsikani nezvaunazvo)
Naizvozvo, usachengete nherera nehudzvanyiriri
Uye usadzinge uyo anokumbira (mupe)
Uyezve taura pamusoro pemakomborero aTenzi vako (awakapiwa, Huporofita nemamwewo)
Hatina here kukuvhura chipfuva chako (Iwe Muhammad (SAW)
Uye tikabvisa kubva kwauri misengwa yako
Iyo yairemera musana wako (yaidzikisira chimiro chako)
Uye tikasimudzira kuzivikanwa kwako
Zvirokwazvo, pane matambudziko pane kugarika
Zvirokwazvo, pane matambudziko pane kugarika
Naizvozvo kana wapedza (basa rako), zvipire (kuna Allah uchivanamata)
Uye kuna Tenzi vako zvipire nekuvimba kwako kwose
